title: Michael Saylor Issues Rally Cry To Bitcoin Army: “Starve The Bears!”
body: Michael Saylor’s latest push to steady Bitcoin holders arrived as markets wobbled this week. A 15-second clip and a fresh corporate buy were timed closely, and both landed while investors were still digesting a sharp pullback that pushed Bitcoin near $102,000 before a rebound. Related Reading: Dogecoin Sheds 25% As $57M Flees Market — Can The Memecoin Recover? Saylor Issues Viral Warning According to a short cinematic video titled “Don’t Feed The [Bitcoin] Bears,” Saylor used a playful metaphor — “Ursus Bitcoinius, the Bitcoin Bear” — to urge holders not to reward bearish chatter. Based on reports, Strategy, formerly MicroStrategy, also announced a purchase of 220 BTC for about $27
timestamp: Thu Oct 16 2025 15:00:49 GMT+0200 (Central European Summer Time)
